column2: Number of Labels/ Stickersin a pack

1. 19 CMS X 30 CMS, GSM 80,WHITE MAPLITHO with importedadhesive releasing paper 60gsm at the right halve . Therewill be six set of sticker in onesheet . The half gummed stickershall not have any gummedbased in the other portion .
column4: 1. 19 CMS X 30 CMS, GSM 80, WHITE MAPLITHO with imported adhesivereleasing paper 60 gsm at the right halve . There will be six set of sticker inone sheet . The half gummed sticker shall not have any gummed based inthe other portion .

column2: 2. Size of Part one & Part twowill be 5 CM x 9.5 CM eachincluding the portion forpunching on both side fortractor feeding in Dot MatrixPrinter .
column4: 2. Size of Part one & Part two will be 5 CM x 9.5 CM each including theportion for punching on both side for tractor feeding in Dot Matrix Printer .

column2: 4. There will be horizontaltractor perforation line of one(1) CMs each on both side andhorizontal perforation at every5 CMs height . The StickerSheet shall have two number ofSticker in its breath dulyseparated by verticalperforation.
column4: 4. There will be horizontal tractor perforation line of one (1) CMs each onboth side and horizontal perforation at every 5 CMs height . The StickerSheet shall have two number of Sticker in its breath duly separated byvertical perforation.
